Interface BaseApiService

  • public interface BaseApiService
    Interface of all GET and POST requests

      • getAccount

        @GET("account/{id}/getAccount")
retrofit2.Call<Account> getAccount​(@Path("id")
                                   int id)
        Calls a GET request. Method to get an Account based on its id
        Parameters:
        id - Id to be searched
        Returns:
        Returns found account

retrofit2.Call<Account> requestLogin​(@Query("email")

                                     java.lang.String password)

        password - Password to be searched

retrofit2.Call<Account> requestRegister​(@Query("name")

                                        @Query("email")

                                        @Query("password")
                                        java.lang.String password)

        Parameters:
        name - Name to be registered
        email - Email to be registered
        password - Password to be registered

retrofit2.Call<Renter> requestRegisterRenter​(@Path("id")
                                             int id,

                                             java.lang.String username,
                                             @Query("address")
                                             java.lang.String address,
                                             @Query("phoneNumber")
                                             java.lang.String phoneNumber)

        Parameters:
        id - Id of the account
        username - Name to be registered
        address - Address to be registered
        phoneNumber - Phone Number to be registered
        Returns:
        Returns registered renter

      • requestTopUp

        @POST("account/{id}/topUp")
retrofit2.Call<java.lang.Boolean> requestTopUp​(@Path("id")
                                               int id,
                                               @Query("balance")
                                               double balance)
        Calls a POST request. Method to top up an account's Account.balance based on its amount
        Parameters:
        id - Id of the account
        balance - Amount to be topped up
        Returns:
        Returns true if top up was successful

      • getPaginatedRoom

        @GET("room/{id}/getPaginatedRoom")
retrofit2.Call<java.util.List<Room>> getPaginatedRoom​(@Path("id")
                                                      int id,
                                                      @Query("page")
                                                      int page,
                                                      @Query("pageSize")
                                                      int pageSize,
                                                      @Query("rented")
                                                      boolean rented)
        Calls GET request. Method to paginate a List of Room
        Parameters:
        id - Id of account
        page - Page number
        pageSize - Page size
        rented - Rented status
        Returns:
        Returns List of paginated rooms

      • requestCreateRoom

        @POST("room/create")
retrofit2.Call<Room> requestCreateRoom​(@Query("accountId")
                                       int accountId,
                                       @Query("name")
                                       java.lang.String name,
                                       @Query("size")
                                       int size,
                                       @Query("price")
                                       int price,
                                       @Query("facility")
                                       java.util.ArrayList<Facility> facility,
                                       @Query("city")
                                       City city,
                                       @Query("bedType")
                                       BedType bedType,
                                       @Query("address")
                                       java.lang.String address)
        Calls POST request. Method to create a new Room
        Parameters:
        accountId - Id of renter
        name - Room's name
        size - Room's size
        price - Room's Price
        facility - Room's Facility
        city - Room's City
        bedType - Room's BedType
        address - Room's address
        Returns:
        Returns newly created room

      • requestCreatePayment

        @POST("payment/create")
retrofit2.Call<Payment> requestCreatePayment​(@Query("buyerId")
                                             int buyerId,
                                             @Query("renterId")
                                             int renterId,
                                             @Query("roomId")
                                             int roomId,
                                             @Query("from")
                                             java.lang.String from,
                                             @Query("to")
                                             java.lang.String to)
        Calls POST request. Method to create a new Payment
        Parameters:
        buyerId - Id of the buyer
        renterId - Id of the renter
        roomId - Id of the room
        from - Start date of booking
        to - End date of booking
        Returns:
        Returns newly created payment

      • getFilteredRoomByPrice

        @GET("room/{id}/filteredRoomByPrice")
retrofit2.Call<java.util.List<Room>> getFilteredRoomByPrice​(@Path("id")
                                                            int id,
                                                            @Query("priceLow")
                                                            double priceLow,
                                                            @Query("priceHigh")
                                                            double priceHigh,
                                                            @Query("rented")
                                                            boolean rented)
        Calls GET request. Method to filter List of Room by its Price.price
        Parameters:
        id - Id of room
        priceLow - Lower bound of price
        priceHigh - Upper bound of price
        rented - Rented status
        Returns:
        Returns List of filtered rooms
